activities: Nickelodeon Single Sign-On Project sites (neopets.com and petpetpark.com) uses personal information from its users in the EU to send each user an account activation code (which is kept private) and to respond to such user's inquiries.  Additionally, third party advertisers may receive the personal information of a NeoPets user if such user affirmatively elects (i.e. opts in) to participate in such advertiser's marketing efforts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Nickelodeon Single Sign-On Project sites offers users recourse to the American Arbitration Association's dispute resolution mechanisms to address unresolved complaints.
